attributes.action: Lets get help for Britain back and not continuosly sent to foreign countries
attributes.additional_details: I have noticed that over the past few years Britain has been getting into alot of debt,People are being fobbed off for jobs,other people not being able to get a home,Fobbed off for the help and life they are entitled to...alot of things come into this criteria and not much is done about it,but i have also noticed that alot of money and help etc... is sent over to other countries to help them out more.I would like things to change for the uk even if its just that little bit of change,to help us all get the help we all know we deserve.Help us get our country ,our jobs etc...get back on track and to as they say good health again.
